feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [BHS7][Dedicated Server] - Network equipement operation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 14, 07:00 - 11:30 UTC

Sep 2, 11:38 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 14/09/2022 07:00 UTC
End time : 14/09/2022 11:30 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : In order to maintain continuous improvement of our internal network infrastructure and to have a homogeneous park, we will do a operation on a network equipment.

entry.title: [SBG3][Network] - Network equipment operation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 5, 20:00 - 23:59 UTC

Aug 22, 12:07 UTC
Update - The maintenance has been postponed. Here is the new schedule :
Start time : 05/09/2022 20:00 UTC
End time : 05/09/2022 23:59 UTC

Aug 16, 19:26 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 23/08/2022 20:00 UTC
End time : 23/08/2022 23:59 UTC
Service impact : Loss of all service behind the concerned devices for 30 minutes each one.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on some network equipment.

entry.title: [RBX/BHS][Backup Storage] - Firewall upgrade
entry.content:
Sep 2, 12:09 UTC
Completed - Start time : 23/08/2022 06:30 UTC
End time : 30/08/2022 15:00 UTC
Service impact : Slowdowns (a few seconds) may be observed during the deployment on your specific server.
Service improvement : Following the incident that occurred during the maintenance in https://bare-metal-servers.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/c205tcjnl5q4, new deployment has been done successfully.

Aug 30, 14:52 UTC
Verifying - The maintenance is completed, we keep the task in monitoring to validate the maintenance.

Aug 23, 06:30 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Aug 2, 22:32 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 23/08/2022 06:30 UTC
End time : 30/08/2022 15:00 UTC
Service impact : Slowdowns (a few seconds) may be observed during the deployment on your specific server.
Service improvement : Following the incident that occurred during the maintenance in https://bare-metal-servers.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/c205tcjnl5q4, we've rollback the change and we are now ready to plan a new deployment.
